venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
Django Unchained is the newest film from Quentin Tarantino.  Django* (Jamie Foxx) and his wife (Kerry Washington) are captured and sold into slavery. A bounty hunter (Christoph Waltz) frees Django and they make a deal: Django helps him track down some wanted men and the bounty hunter helps free Django's wife.

Also stars Leonardo DiCaprio, Samuel L. Jackson, and Joseph Gordon Levitt.

This movie is released on Christmas Day. It will be a couple weeks until I'm available to see it, so let's get together after the new year. Blackstone Valley Cinema has bargains on Tuesday nights. That's a good night for a movie. Let's meet in the lobby at 6:15 for the 6:40 PM show.

If you need to reach me, my cell phone number is 508-981-0455.

* The 'D' is silent

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Django Unchained
